tool_description: Download Video and Image from Pinterest
name: Pinterest Video and Image Downloader
title: Pinterest Video and Image Downloader

api_list.name: Get Pinterest Video/Image Link

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Both Full and Short Pin support.

api_list.name: Get Pins by Pinterest User
api_list.description: Return Image and Video of Pinterest User

optional_parameters.name: bookmark
optional_parameters.description: A bookmark is used to access the next page of data. Each page typically returns 20-25 pins, and you receive the bookmark value in response to the first page's data.
